text: 2:4 Mak 16:20; Aposel 2:22; 14:3; 1 Korin 2:4; 12:4; 12:7; 12:11; Efesus 1:5; 1:9Dughiar kamɨn, God mirakelɨn igharagha gariba ko dɨgavir kuram gamir arazibagh amua uan ifongiamɨn gɨn ghua Godɨn Duamɨn bizir aghuiba tuiragha gumazamizibagh anɨdi. Ezɨ arazir kamɨn a kamaghɨn en aka, an Otarimɨn akar kam a bar guizbangɨra ghu.
